languages.text: "И пусть мои глаза кровоточат от его сияния, я вижу, как Ирлиэт растворяется в белизне скорби при разговорах о доме. И как пунцовые всполохи накаляются в воздухе при упоминании о ее предательстве".

traits.locale_text: "И пусть мои глаза кровоточат от его сияния, я вижу, как Ирлиэт растворяется в белизне скорби при разговорах о доме. И как пунцовые всполохи накаляются в воздухе при упоминании о ее предательстве".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."
languages.original_text: "И пусть мои глаза кровоточат от его сияния, я вижу, как Ирлиэт растворяется в белизне скорби при разговорах о доме. И как пунцовые всполохи накаляются в воздухе при упоминании о ее предательстве".

traits.locale_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

traits.locale_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “虽然它的光芒会让我的眼睛流血，但我能看到，每次伊莉耶特提到家园的时候，都会融入一片哀伤的白色之中。而每当提及她的背叛，空气中便会闪烁着深红色的光芒。”
languages.original_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

traits.locale_text: “虽然它的光芒会让我的眼睛流血，但我能看到，每次伊莉耶特提到家园的时候，都会融入一片哀伤的白色之中。而每当提及她的背叛，空气中便会闪烁着深红色的光芒。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

languages.text: «Y aunque su brillo hace que me sangren los ojos, veo cómo Yrliet se disuelve en el blanco del pesar cada vez que habla de su hogar. Y los destellos rojos que electrizan el aire cada vez que alguien menciona su traición».
languages.original_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

traits.locale_text: «Y aunque su brillo hace que me sangren los ojos, veo cómo Yrliet se disuelve en el blanco del pesar cada vez que habla de su hogar. Y los destellos rojos que electrizan el aire cada vez que alguien menciona su traición».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そして、その輝きは私の目から血を滴らせる。彼女が故郷のことを語るたびに、ユリエットが悲しみの白さに溶けていくのがわかるのです。そして、彼女の裏切りが語られるたびに、真紅の閃光が空気に電気を走らせる」
languages.original_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、その輝きは私の目から血を滴らせる。彼女が故郷のことを語るたびに、ユリエットが悲しみの白さに溶けていくのがわかるのです。そして、彼女の裏切りが語られるたびに、真紅の閃光が空気に電気を走らせる」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Und obwohl sein Glanz meine Augen bluten lässt, sehe ich, wie Yrliet sich in das grelle Weiß der Trauer auflöst, wann immer sie von ihrer Heimat spricht. Und wie rote Blitze die Luft elektrisieren, wann immer ihr Verrat erwähnt wird."
languages.original_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

traits.locale_text: "Und obwohl sein Glanz meine Augen bluten lässt, sehe ich, wie Yrliet sich in das grelle Weiß der Trauer auflöst, wann immer sie von ihrer Heimat spricht. Und wie rote Blitze die Luft elektrisieren, wann immer ihr Verrat erwähnt wird."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Bien que cet étalage de couleurs criardes m'aveugle, Yrliet se dissout dans le blanc de la douleur chaque fois qu'elle parle de son foyer, et des éclairs écarlates crépitent dans l'air quand quelqu'un mentionne sa trahison. »
languages.original_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

traits.locale_text: « Bien que cet étalage de couleurs criardes m'aveugle, Yrliet se dissout dans le blanc de la douleur chaque fois qu'elle parle de son foyer, et des éclairs écarlates crépitent dans l'air quand quelqu'un mentionne sa trahison. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu el işinin parlaklığından gözlerime ağrılar girse de Yrliet'in, yurdunu her anlatışında kederin beyazına boğuluşunu görebiliyorum. İhanetinden her bahsedildiğinde havayı elektriklendiren kan kırmızısı şimşekleri de."
languages.original_text: "And though its shining makes my eyes bleed, I see the way Yrliet dissolves into the whiteness of grief every time she speaks of home. And the way crimson flashes electrify the air every time her betrayal is mentioned."

traits.locale_text: "Bu el işinin parlayışından gözlerime ağrılar girse de, Yrliet'in yurdunu her anlattığında kederin beyazına boğuluşunu görebiliyorum. İhanetinden her bahsedildiğinde havayı dolduran kan kırmızısını da."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
